articles.title: Kim Jong Un Visits Sinchang Fish Farm
articles.content:
Kim Jong Un Visits Sinchang Fish Farm
						
 Pyongyang, May 15 (KCNA) -- Supreme Commander of the Korean People's Army Kim Jong Un, first secretary of the Workers' Party of Korea and first chairman of the DPRK National Defence Commission, gave field guidance to the Sinchang Fish Farm under KPA Unit 810. 
					 He went round the monument to the on-site guidance of the great Generalissimos Kim Il Sung and Kim Jong Il and the room for education in the revolutionary history.
					
					 He said that the fish farm, built on the personal initiative of Kim Il Sung, is associated with the undying feats of Kim Jong Il who had worked heart and soul with his desire to provide the servicepersons and civilians with famous and delicious fish dishes. 
					
					 He enjoyed a bird's-eye view of the fish farm that underwent a cataclysmic change under the care of Kim Jong Il and the WPK. 
					
					 The environment of the farm is very nice and it fully embodied the Party's policy of turning the country into a thick woodland and greenery, he said with pleasure, adding that the farm looks like a botanical garden and it changed beyond recognition.
					
					 He noted that Kim Jong Il provided vast fund for updating the Sinchang Fish Farm for the servicepersons and civilians as a model of the country during the hard time. It is a fruit of Kim Jong Il's warm love for the people, he said.
					
					 Proposing building a mosaic depicting the smiling image of Kim Jong Il in the precinct of the fish farm, he personally appointed the site for it. 
					
					 After being briefed on the farm before the panoramic picture he went round several fishing ponds, hatchery of sturgeon, springs and other parts of the farm to learn in detail about its management and operation. 
					
					 The Sinchang Fish Farm, situated in the most ideal place for pisciculture in the light of physiography and ecological environment, is a large-scale fish farm to be proud of before the world for its production area and output, he said.
					
					 Saying the farm has not only gained rich experience in pisciculture but also laid a strong material and technical foundation, he urged it to strive for a higher goal and thus fulfill its mission and role as the fish farm representing the ever-developing pisciculture of the country and an exemplary educational unit in developing the country's fish farming.
					
					 It is a firm resolution of the Party to make the revolution in fish farming started by the Generalissimos sweep the whole country, he said, giving important teachings to bring about a fresh turn in the country's fish farming.
					
					 He expressed expectation and belief that the officials and employees of the farm would play a vanguard role in developing the country's pisciculture and had a photo session with them.
					
					 Accompanying him were Hwang Pyong So, Kim Yang Gon, O Su Yong, O Il Jong, Ri Jae Il, Jo Yong Won, Pak Yong Sik and O Kum Chol.

articles.title: Kim Jong Un Sends Messages to Foreign Heads of State
articles.content:
Kim Jong Un Sends Messages to Foreign Heads of State
						
 Pyongyang, May 15 (KCNA) -- Supreme leader Kim Jong Un sent messages to foreign heads of state in reply to their congratulatory messages on the occasion of the birth anniversary of President Kim Il Sung (the Day of the Sun).
					 They included the presidents of Myanmar, Syria, Pakistan, Nigeria, DR Congo and Uganda.
					
					 In the reply messages Kim Jong Un expressed deep thanks to them for their congratulatory messages on the occasion of the Day of the Sun.
					
					 Expressing belief that the good relations of friendship and cooperation between the DPRK and the relevant countries would grow stronger, he wished the presidents successes in their work for the stability and prosperity of their countries.

articles.title: Kim Yong Nam Receives Credentials
articles.content:
Kim Yong Nam Receives Credentials
						
 Pyongyang, May 15 (KCNA) -- Kim Yong Nam, president of the Presidium of the DPRK Supreme People's Assembly, received credentials from Gonzalo Ortiz Diez-Tortosa, Spanish ambassador to the DPRK, at the Mansudae Assembly Hall on Friday.

articles.title: DPRK Premier Makes Field Survey of Construction of Major Objects
articles.content:
DPRK Premier Makes Field Survey of Construction of Major Objects
						
 Pyongyang, May 15 (KCNA) -- DPRK Premier Pak Pong Ju made field surveys of the construction site of the Paektusan Songun Youth Power Station and the project for remodeling Samjiyon township.
					 The premier looked round the dam tamping construction site, generator room and other places of Paektusan Songun Youth Power Station No. 1 to learn about the construction there. And he held a consultative meeting of officials concerned on the spot.
					
					 The meeting discussed measures to finish the construction of Paektusan Songun Youth Power Station Nos. 1 and 2 by the 70th founding anniversary of the Workers' Party of Korea, true to the important tasks given by Marshal Kim Jong Un while providing field guidance to the construction site.
					
					 Steps were taken to satisfactorily ensure cement, steel and other building materials and generating equipment in good time.
					
					 He learned in detail about the project for remodeling Samjiyon township area including the Samjiyon Schoolchildren's Palace, the Samjiyon County Cultural Hall and Pegaebong Noodle House.
					
					 Discussed on the spot was the issue of finishing at an early date the project on the highest level, true to the noble intention of the Workers' Party of Korea to make cheers for socialism and the WPK heard from the first village under Mt. Paektu earlier.
					
					 Going round the construction site of the multi-tier power stations on the Chongchon River, the premier underlined the need to step up the project and called upon relevant units to push forward the production of generating equipment.

articles.title: Participants in International Trade Fair Visit Mangyongdae
articles.content:
Participants in International Trade Fair Visit Mangyongdae
						
 Pyongyang, May 15 (KCNA) -- Participants in the 18th Pyongyang Spring International Trade Fair visited Mangyongdae, the birthplace of President Kim Il Sung, Friday.
					 They laid bouquets before the old home in Mangyongdae in boundless reverence for the President.
					
					 Being briefed on the old home, they looked round historical relics and then mounted Mangyong Hill.
					
					 They also toured the Tower of the Juche Idea, the Arch of Triumph, the International Friendship Exhibition House and other places.

articles.title: Japanese Authorities Urged to Set Free Chongryon Officials
articles.content:
Japanese Authorities Urged to Set Free Chongryon Officials
						
 Pyongyang, May 15 (KCNA) -- A spokesman for the Association of Korean Victims of Forcible Drafting and Their Bereaved Families made public a statement on Friday to denounce the Japanese authorities for their suppression of the General Association of Korean Residents in Japan (Chongryon).
					 The Japanese reactionaries arrested officials of Chongryon without any legal ground this time in the wake of the search for the houses of leading officials of Chongryon in March, the statement recalled, adding this was an extremely hostile provocation against the DPRK, the action which can never be pardoned not only from the viewpoint of international diplomatic practice but in the light of common sense.
					
					 It went on:
					
					 Japan is censured by the international community for rushing headlong into militarist reinvasion, refusing to admit and repent of the past state-sponsored drafting. This brings to light the bestial nature of Japan trampling down on the dignity of the Korean nation, its miserable victim, in broad daylight. The Koreans are bitterly angered by the recent brutal action.
					
					 The Association of Korean Victims of Forcible Drafting and Their Bereaved Families strongly demands the Japanese authorities apologize for inhuman fascist tyranny against Chongryon, a dignified overseas citizens organization, and immediately set free the guiltless persons.
					
					 The Japanese reactionaries should stop acting rashly, clearly understanding that their unreasonable suppression of Chongryon is bound to bring them self-destruction.

articles.title: Japanese Reactionaries' Fascist Tyranny against Chongryon Deserves Punishment
articles.content:
Japanese Reactionaries' Fascist Tyranny against Chongryon Deserves Punishment
 Pyongyang, May 15 (KCNA) -- The Korean Committee on Measures for the Sexual Slavery for Japanese Army and Drafting Victims released a statement on Friday to denounce the Japanese reactionaries' tyrannical action against officials of the General Association of Korean Residents in Japan (Chongryon).
					 The statement condemned the Japanese reactionaries' arrest of officials of Chongryon on May 12 as an unpardonable encroachment upon the sovereignty of the DPRK and an unbearable fascist repressive action to stamp out Chongryon.
					
					 This was an illegal fascist action taken without any legal ground and part of the organized and premeditated moves against Chongryon pursuant to the scenario carefully worked out by the authorities, the statement said, and went on:
					
					 Lurking behind this is a cynic ploy of the Japanese reactionaries to tarnish the image of Chongryon, a legitimate overseas citizens organization of the DPRK, and create an atmosphere against Chongryon and Koreans in the Japanese society by labeling Chongryon an "illegal organization" and "criminal organization".
					
					 All facts fully prove that a "law-governing state" much touted by the Japanese reactionaries is nothing but fig-leaf to mislead public opinion at home and abroad and Japan is a repressive police state and a fascist  state abusing human rights.
					
					 They should stop acting rashly, clearly understanding the DPRK's will to resolutely punish them, stop at once the base and despicable moves to suppress and stamp out Chongryon and unconditionally apologize to the Korean nation and Chongryon for their human rights abuses.

articles.title: DLAK Spokesman Denounces Japanese Reactionaries' Crackdown upon Chongryon
articles.content:
DLAK Spokesman Denounces Japanese Reactionaries' Crackdown upon Chongryon
 Pyongyang, May 15 (KCNA) -- As already reported, policemen under the joint investigation headquarters of Japan on Tuesday arrested 3 officials of the General Association of Korean Residents in Japan (Chongryon) including a vice department director of its Central Standing Committee, walked off them in handcuffs in the eyes of their family members and searched their houses on groundless charges of involvement in the "Oriental Co. Ltd's violation of the law on foreign exchange."
					 A spokesman for the Democratic Lawyers Association of Korea (DLAK) in a statement on Thursday vehemently denounced the Japanese reactionaries' brutal suppression of Chongryon officials as a hideous politically-motivated provocation against the DPRK and Chongryon, an illegal human rights abuse and fascist crackdown.
					
					 Lurking behind the recent action is a sinister intention of the Japanese reactionaries to stamp out Chongryon by branding it as an "illegal organization" and "criminal organization", incite anti-Chongryon, anti-DPRK atmosphere throughout the Japanese society and thus revive militarism and realize its wild ambition for reinvading Asia at any cost, the statement said, and went on:
					
					 Their fascist action is touching off bitterer anti-Japanese sentiments among the 70 million Koreans as it was another unpardonable act of adding to the unprecedented crimes perpetrated by the Japanese imperialists against the Koreans in the past. 
					
					 The Japanese authorities should stop acting rashly, well aware of the catastrophic consequences to be entailed by their conspiratorial crackdown upon Chongryon, immediately set free the illegally arrested Chongryon officials and apologize to the Korean nation for the action. 
					
					 The fair-minded lawyers of Japan and the international community should properly see through the ulterior aim sought by the Japanese authorities in their undemocratic and inhuman suppression of Chongryon and resolutely hold in check it.

articles.title: Youth Shock Brigade for Speed Campaign Marks 40th Anniversary of Its Foundation
articles.content:
Youth Shock Brigade for Speed Campaign Marks 40th Anniversary of Its Foundation
 Pyongyang, May 15 (KCNA) -- The Youth Shock Brigade for Speed Campaign observed the 40th anniversary of its foundation.
					 Leader Kim Jong Il personally organized the shock brigade 40 years ago, instilling wisdom and encouragement into it and training it as a powerful combat unit making a breakthrough in construction through a speed campaign.
					
					 The shock brigade has fully demonstrated the might of regular militant labor unit in very construction site, covering a proud path.
					
					 Members and officials of the shock brigade performed heroic feats at construction sites for monumental structures and northern railways to glorify the revolutionary traditions of the Workers' Party of Korea. They performed labor feats at all construction sites such as the International Friendship Exhibition House, the Grand People's Study House, Kwangbok Street, Thongil Street, the Youth Hero Motorway and Mansudae Street.
					
					 The shock brigade was awarded Order of Kim Il Sung and Order of National Flag First Class and it produced many labor heroes, Kim Il Sung Youth Honor Prize winners and recipients of other state commendations, young innovators and innovators. In this course it has turned into a revolutionary university for training reliable young core elements of the Party.
					
					 There took place a meeting at the People's Palace of Culture Friday.
					
					 A congratulatory message of the Central Committee of the Workers' Party of Korea to the members and officials of the shock brigade was read out at the meeting.

articles.title: Photo Exhibition Opens to Mark Anniversary of Youth Shock Brigade for Speed Campaign
articles.content:
Photo Exhibition Opens to Mark Anniversary of Youth Shock Brigade for Speed Campaign
						
 Pyongyang, May 15 (KCNA) -- A photo exhibition took place with due ceremony at the Central Youth Hall on Thursday to mark the 40th anniversary of the founding of the Youth Shock Brigade for Speed Campaign.
					 Displayed at the exhibition hall were photos dealing with the feats the peerlessly great persons of Mt. Paektu performed by building up the shock brigade into a good revolutionary school to train reliable young vanguard of the party and leading its work with loving care.
					
					 Also on display there were photos introducing the shock brigade members who performed miracles and feats in socialist construction sites.
					
					 Present at the opening ceremony were Ri Il Hwan, department director of the Central Committee of the Workers' Party of Korea, Jon Yong Nam, chairman of the Central Committee of the youth league, officials of the youth league, officials and members of the shock brigade and persons of meritorious services.

articles.title: Participants of Youth Meeting Meet with Youth and Students in Pyongyang
articles.content:
Participants of Youth Meeting Meet with Youth and Students in Pyongyang
						
 Pyongyang, May 15 (KCNA) -- Meetings between participants of the 2nd National Meeting of Young Frontrunners in Noble Traits and youth and students took place at Kim Il Sung University, the Kim Jong Suk Pyongyang Textile Mill, the Youth Park Open-Air Theatre and other places in Pyongyang.
					 Participants of the youth meeting recalled with deep emotion that supreme leader Kim Jong Un called them to the 2nd National Meeting of Young Frontrunners in Noble Traits and showed deep loving care upon them though they just fulfilled their duties as young people in the era of Songun.
					
					 They ardently called upon all other youth and students to demonstrate the spirit of the power of youth before the world and glorify their worthwhile youth to be remembered by the party and the country and loved by the people.
					
					 The floor was taken by other young people.
					
					 They evinced their resolution to become excellent youth in the era of Songun who do more good things for the society and the collective, learning from the beautiful and noble moral traits of the young frontrunners in noble traits equipped with the noble spiritual outlook.
					
					 They chanted revolutionary and militant slogans and sang together "March of Korean Youth" and other songs at the meetings.

articles.title: Birthday Party Given for Participants of Youth Meeting
articles.content:
Birthday Party Given for Participants of Youth Meeting
						
 Pyongyang, May 15 (KCNA) -- A birthday party was given for the participants in the 2nd National Meeting of Young Frontrunners in Noble Traits at the April 25 Hotel on Friday.
					 Jon Yong Nam, chairman of the Central Committee of the Kim Il Sung Socialist Youth League, recalled that supreme leader Kim Jong Un showed such warm care as making sure that the birthday party was given for the participants on their birthdays during the meeting.
					
					 He called upon the participants to always remember the honor and remain intensely loyal to Kim Jong Un and make every moment of their life worthwhile by dynamically advancing towards the final victory of the revolutionary cause of Juche.
					
					 The participants renewed their firm resolution to give fuller play to the heroic stamina and noble traits of the Korean youth in the historic march for the victorious advance in the new century of Juche.

articles.title: 15th May 21 Architectural Festival Held
articles.content:
15th May 21 Architectural Festival Held
 Pyongyang, May 15 (KCNA) -- The 15th May 21 Architectural Festival took place in Pyongyang.
					 According to Ryu Jae Ung, an official of the C.C., the Architects Union of Korea, on display at the festival were 230 architectural designs, 280 scientific papers, 20 designing programs and multimedia and 20 building materials, which proved successful at Pyongyang City and provincial festivals.
					
					 Among architectural designs were those for green buildings based on solar heat, wind power and geotherm, he said, and continued:
					
					 What drew attention of experts was the method of 5D designing, which would be conducive to the development of architectural designing.
					
					 Building materials, made with locally available raw materials, were also highly appreciated at the festival.

articles.title: Architectural Festival Closes
articles.content:
Architectural Festival Closes
						
 Pyongyang, May 15 (KCNA) -- The 15th May 21 Architectural Festival closed with due ceremony at the Central Youth Hall on Friday.
					 During the festival its participants exchanged the achievements and experience gained in the field of construction science and technology for opening a heyday in construction true to the Party's idea on Juche-based architecture.
					
					 Architectural designing programs and a lot of papers were highly estimated at the festival.

articles.title: Integrated Production Control System Standardized in DPRK
articles.content:
Integrated Production Control System Standardized in DPRK
						
 Pyongyang, May 15 (KCNA) -- Kim Chaek University of Technology in the DPRK has recently established a standardized integrated production control system.
					 In this regard, Kim Ryong Su, department head of the university, told KCNA:
					
					 The new integrated production control system can be applied to factories which have continuous production process.
					
					 The system is put on a higher level in intellectual and IT level.
					
					 The system was applied to a foodstuff factory, which was proved very secure and convenient in operating production process and highly economic.

articles.title: Well-Known Sports School in DPRK
articles.content:
Well-Known Sports School in DPRK
						
 Pyongyang, May 15 (KCNA) -- The Sunam District Juvenile Sports School in Chongjin City, North Hamgyong Province of the DPRK, is well known throughout the country for producing many sports aces. 
					 According to its Principal Ri Chan Bok, the school has won 92 gold medals and three trophies in weightlifting and football events at the National Games of Juvenile Sports Schools.
					
					 The school has produced 17 national athletes, including weightlifter Om Yun Chol, winner of Kim Jong Il Prize, the title of Labor Hero and the title of People's Athlete, he said, adding:
					
					 In the last 18 years, it has trained over 470 sportspersons who have been active in different sports teams. We are fully determined to produce more sports aces who will glorify the country as a sports power.

articles.title: Work for Securing Water Makes Rapid Progress
articles.content:
Work for Securing Water Makes Rapid Progress
 Pyongyang, May 15 (KCNA) -- A work for securing irrigation water this year is going full steam ahead in the DPRK.
					 Projects for main water sources including reservoirs and nearly 100 000 auxiliary water sources have already been completed in different parts of the country to secure large quantities of water.
					
					 Officials of the Ministry of Agriculture and those across the country have taken thoroughgoing measures to step up the work for holding water.
					
					 Signal successes were reported from South Hwanghae Province.
					
					 The building of at least 60 000 irrigation facilities has been successfully wound up in the province to secure large quantities of water.
					
					 Sinchon County installed at least 500 new water pumps to irrigate thousands of hectares. The Samjigang Cooperative Farm in Jaeryong County and many other cooperative farms successfully undertook various projects to secure water.
					
					Successes were also reported from South Hamgyong Province.
					
					 Agricultural workers in Hongwon, Jongphyong, Yonggwang and Toksong counties succeeded in digging hundreds of wells and water holes to obtain a big water source.
					
					 Chongjin City, Kyongwon and Kyonghung counties in North Hamgyong Province successfully built many large reservoirs and other structures to ensure safe rice cultivation despite any long spell of drought.
					
					 Signal successes were also reported from Pyongyang City, South Phyongan, North Phyongan, North Hwanghae and other provinces.

articles.title: Medicinal Effect of Wild Ginger
articles.content:
Medicinal Effect of Wild Ginger
						
 Pyongyang, May 15 (KCNA) -- Wild ginger draws attention of medical persons for its medicinal effect, said Sim Un Hui, a researcher of the Pyongyang Medical College of Kim Il Sung University, when interviewed by KCNA.
					 She said:
					
					 From olden times, Koreans have used wild ginger for treating diseases.
					
					 In particular, its root is of high medicinal effect. Recently the anti-virus effect of wild ginger has been proved.
					
					 We developed the method of extracting essential oil from wild ginger and, on this basis, produced neuralgic injection which is especially efficacious for sciatica. The injection was also proved effective in treating trigeminal neuralgia, brachialgia, intercostal neuralgia, zona, etc.

articles.title: Japan Drives DPRK-Japan Relations to Worst Phase: DPRK Scholar
articles.content:
Japan Drives DPRK-Japan Relations to Worst Phase: DPRK Scholar
						
 Pyongyang, May 15 (KCNA) -- Japan has been hell-bent on the moves against the General Association of Korean Residents in Japan (Chongryon), driving the DPRK-Japan relations to the worst phase.
					 In this regard, Dr. Sin Pun Jin of the Law College under Kim Il Sung University told KCNA:
					
					 The recent arrest and search against Chongryon officials are a revelation of Japan's sinister scenario to stamp out Chongryon at any cost by branding it as the force intent on "illegal acts".
					
					 The fascist outrage, human rights abuses and national discrimination against Chongryon and the Korean residents in Japan have been committed without any legal ground in Japan, which styles itself "law-governed state".
					
					 At the DPRK-Japan inter-governmental talks held in Stockholm of Sweden in May 2014, the Japanese side agreed to have a sincere discussion on the status of the Korean residents in Japan under the DPRK-Japan Pyongyang Declaration. 
					
					 However, the Japanese authorities are fanning up the anti-Chongryon and anti-Korean sentiments among the Japanese, instead of implementing the agreements.
					
					 Chongryon has played the role of a diplomatic mission representing the DPRK in Japan as there is no diplomatic relations between the two countries. The moves to stamp out Chongryon are, in the final analysis, a deliberate attempt to aggravate the bilateral relations, a vivid expression of Japan's hostile policy toward the DPRK.
					
					 The Japanese government has due legal obligation and moral responsibility to protect the human rights and sphere of life of the Korean residents in Japan as they are descendants of Koreans forcibly drafted by the Japanese imperialists in the past.
					
					 With no rhetoric can Japan justify the sordid political suppression of the Korean residents and Chongryon.
					
					 Japan should behave itself, clearly mindful that its persecution and crackdown upon Chongryon and Korean residents is a grave provocation to the DPRK and a suicidal act of darkening the prospect of DPRK-Japan relations.

articles.title: Japan Should Opt to Honestly Reflect on Its Past Wrongs: Rodong Sinmun
articles.content:
Japan Should Opt to Honestly Reflect on Its Past Wrongs: Rodong Sinmun
						
 Pyongyang, May 15 (KCNA) -- The Japanese chief executive answered a question put by a broadcasting service recently as to if he was likely to use such words as aggression and apology in a statement to be issued on the occasion of the 70th anniversary of Japan's defeat. He jabbered there is no need to issue the statement if such words should be repeated as he had clarified his "view" on carrying forward the successive Cabinets' understanding of history. In other words, he expressed his intention not to say any word about aggression and apology in the statement.
					 Rodong Sinmun Friday in a commentary says the sophism let loose by the Japanese chief executive was a blatant challenge to the just voices of the world as he brought to light his intention to gloss over the repentance of the past wrongdoings and put spurs to the revival of militarism.
					
					 Japan has refused to admit its history of aggression and crimes even now though seven decades have passed since the end of the Second World War, adding to its crimes. the commentary says, adding:
					
					 Japan should redress its past crimes for itself, not for others.
					
					 Japan' history woven with  aggression and crimes can neither be  written off no matter how much water may flow under the bridge and no matter how frequently a generation is replaced by another.
					
					 In view of either historic review or future orientation, this year offers an important occasion to Japan. Japan should take this year as a good occasion of drawing a serious lesson from its shameful defeat in the past and admitting its inglorious past history at an early date. Should Japan, however, more desperately works to revive militarism and launch reinvasion, it will only invite international isolation, curse and rebuff.
					
					 It should not miss the golden chance but opt for sincerely repenting of its crime-woven history.

articles.title: Open Questionnaire to S. Korean Puppet Chief Executive Published
articles.content:
Open Questionnaire to S. Korean Puppet Chief Executive Published
						
 Pyongyang, May 15 (KCNA) -- The Solidarity for Democracy, People's Life, Peaceful Reunification and Sovereignty of south Korea on May 10 published an open questionnaire addressed to the puppet chief executive keen on the madcap moves for escalating confrontation against national reunification.
					 It put the following questions to Park Geun Hye:
					
					1. Has Park Geun Hye a willingness to dismiss Jong Jong Uk from his post of vice-chairman of the "preparatory committee for unification"?
					
					 On March 10 Jong disclosed that the committee is, in actuality,  preparing "unification through absorption," uttering that "there are various ways of unification, there is inside his committee a team for unification lacking agreement or unification of social systems and other organization within the 'government' is also studying unification of social systems".
					
					 At that time the north strongly censured Jong, clarifying its stand that it would not deal with the "government".
					
					 2. Has Park Geun Hye, chairwoman of the committee, known about the existence of the "preparatory team for unification through absorption"?
					
					 The committee is directly under the "president".
					
					 Park is deeply involved in it as she presided over its three meetings.
					
					 The committee would not have been operated without permission of the "president".
					
					 If then, is the real intention of Park "unification through absorption"?
					
					 3. Has Park a willingness to officially declare the drop of "unification through absorption" if she has no idea of it?

articles.title: Elders of Pusan Civic and Public Organizations Demand Retraction of "U.S.-Japan Defense Cooperation Guidelines"
articles.content:
Elders of Pusan Civic and Public Organizations Demand Retraction of "U.S.-Japan Defense Cooperation Guidelines"
						
 Pyongyang, May 15 (KCNA) -- Elders of civic and public organizations of Pusan, south Korea published a declaration on the situation in Pusan on May 13 demanding the immediate retraction of the "U.S.-Japan defense cooperation guidelines".
					 In the declaration they termed the "defense cooperation guidelines" which were revised last month the second "Katsura-Taft Treaty".
					
					 The revised guidelines helped conceal the past crimes of Japan and pave the way for its military hegemony, they charged.
					
					 They demanded an immediate cancellation of the "guidelines" which pose threat to Northeast Asia and discussion of the transfer of OPECON to south Korea from the U.S.

articles.title: S. Korean Conservative Broadcasting Service Accused of False Reporting
articles.content:
S. Korean Conservative Broadcasting Service Accused of False Reporting 
						
 Pyongyang, May 15 (KCNA) -- It has been disclosed that south Korean puppet conservative Channel A aired false reports about the actions of people from all walks of life demanding the probe into the truth about the ferry Sewol disaster, sparking public uproar.
					 On May 6 it showed four photos on the clash between demonstrators and policemen under the explanation "Ferry Sewol demonstrators assaulting police: exclusive photo".
					
					 Showing the photos, the broadcasting service let loose a spate of invectives to hype the demonstrators' violence, asserting that ferry Sewol demonstration resorting to violence cannot be justified.
					
					 However, one of the photos turned out to be a photo showing peasants fighting against police suppression of a rally against the conclusion of FTA in 2003. Another photo was taken at the time of a candlelight rally against import of American beef contained with mad cow disease in 2008. The two photos were reported by other media at that time.
					
					 In this regard public circles charged that this is not a simple mistake but a deliberate act to invent a pretext for cracking down upon the participants in actions to probe the truth about the ferry Sewol disaster.

articles.title: S. Korean Internet Paper Calls for Putting End to Park Geun Hye
articles.content:
S. Korean Internet Paper Calls for Putting End to Park Geun Hye
						
 Pyongyang, May 15 (KCNA) -- Minjok Ilbo, an internet paper of south Korea, in an article on May 13 called upon all people to turn out as one in the action for putting an end to Park Geun Hye.
					 The article said:
					
					 Park Geun Hye forcibly dissolved the Unified Progressive Party, a political coup and fascist tyranny which openly declared the revival of "yusin".
					
					 The way Park Geun Hye took office through the December 19 election coup was little short of the May 16 military coup of Park Chung-Hee who illegally seized power.
					
					 The people are denouncing Park Geun Hye as the killer who caused the ferry Sewol disaster.
					
					 If Park is allowed to stay in power, democracy and people's living will be brought to an end and all people on this land will perish.

articles.title: Newly Disclosed Document Exposes Environmental Pollution by U.S. Forces in S. Korea
articles.content:
Newly Disclosed Document Exposes Environmental Pollution by U.S. Forces in S. Korea
						
 Pyongyang, May 15 (KCNA) -- A new document was disclosed to lay bare the U.S. imperialist aggressors' environmental pollution in south Korea.
					 A report worked out by an engineering corps of the U.S. army in 1991 said that PCB was massively buried in the U.S. military base in Puphyong District, Inchon City in those days.

articles.title: DPRK's Stand on Space Supported by Swiss Bodies
articles.content:
DPRK's Stand on Space Supported by Swiss Bodies
						
 Pyongyang, May 15 (KCNA) -- The Switzerland-Korea Committee and the Swiss Group for the Study of the Juche Idea on May 9 made public a joint statement on May 8 in support of the statement of a spokesman for the National Aerospace Development Administration of the DPRK. 
					 Noting that the spokesman for the National Aerospace Development Administration of the DPRK clarified the principled stand on the use of space for peaceful purpose and study of the space science, the joint statement said:
					
					 The development of space for peaceful purpose is the legitimate right of the DPRK and no one can deprive it of the right. 
					
					 The U.S. and other hostile forces claim that DPRK's satellite launch poses "threat to global peace" but the DPRK will preserve its independent right to the last. 
					
					 The U.S. is not entitled to obstruct the DPRK's development of space for peaceful purpose while terming it "threat" as the U.S. has stockpiled the biggest nukes and weapons of mass destruction in the world and it is the only country which used nuclear weapons.

articles.title: Kim Jong Un Lauded by Nigerian Body
articles.content:
Kim Jong Un Lauded by Nigerian Body
 Pyongyang, May 15 (KCNA) -- The Nigerian National Committee for the Study of Kimilsungism-Kimjongilism on May 6 posted on its website an article titled "Kim Jong Un's mode of creation".
					 The article said that the DPRK draws the attention of the international community as its appearance is changing day by day. It went on:
					
					 What is the mode of creation of supreme leader Kim Jong Un who is leading the building of a thriving socialist nation in the DPRK?
					
					 Firstly, it is to break through the world level.
					
					 Everything he creates is fresh, innovative and enterprising.
					
					 It is his goal to break through the world level not only in architecture but in all sectors.
					
					 Secondly, it is an extraordinary speed of creation.
					
					 He, the youngest leader in the world, makes sure that anything is concluded in the shortest period at one go.
					
					 Thirdly, it is very big and huge.
					
					 It is his criterion of creation that any structure should be built into monumental edifice of eternal value.
					
					 The article cited the facts to introduce his very huge and all-inclusive realm of creation.
					
					 It noted that the DPRK will reach a high eminence of a thriving socialist nation in a near future thanks to Kim Jong Un who set up and carry out the goal of building an economic power and a sports power in the wake of a political, ideological and military power and a space power.

articles.title: Kim Jong Un recorre piscifactoria de Sinchang de EPC
articles.content:
Kim Jong Un recorre piscifactoria de Sinchang de EPC
						
Pyongyang, 15 de mayo (ACNC) -- El Mariscal Kim Jong Un, Primer Secretario del Partido del Trabajo de Corea, Primer Presidente del Comite de Defensa Nacional de la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea y Comandante Supremo del Ejercito Popular de Corea, dirigio en el terreno la piscifactoria de Sinchang adscrita a la unidad 810 del EPC.
					Ante todo, el Mariscal paso revista al monumento en memoria de la visita de orientacion y la sala de educacion en la historia revolucionaria de los grandes hombres sin iguales del monte Paektu.
					
					Dijo que en este criadero formado por la iniciativa directa del Presidente Kim Il Sung, estan impregnadas las hazanas de orientacion del Dirigente Kim Jong Il quien dedico todo lo suyo diciendo que su deseo era ofrecer a los uniformados y civiles los sabrosos platos de pescados famosos del mundo.
					
					Caminando por el recinto de la piscifactoria convertida maravillosamente gracias a la guia del Dirigente y el partido, el Mariscal presencio el panorama.
					
					Se alegro mucho diciendo que le gusta bien el medioambiente del criadero y es el criadero donde se materializo tan exactamente la politica de partido de realizar la reforestacion y la creacion de areas verdes. Anadio que el criadero parece a un jardin botanico y que se ha cambiado su fisonomia mas radicalmente que en el pasado cuando la visito.
					
					Prosiguio que la piscifactoria de Sinchang es el resultado de amor por el pueblo del Dirigente quien la acondiciono como modelo del pais para los soldados y pueblos asegurando inmensos fondos en el periodo en que el pais sufria las dificultades.
					
					Instruyo levantar en el recinto del criadero el mural de mosaico con imagen sonriente del Dirigente y escogio personalmente su solar.
					
					Tras escuchar las explicaciones ante el plano panoramico, el Mariscal recorrio varios tanques, el lugar de incubacion de esturiones, la laguna principal y otros para averiguar en detalles del estado de administracion del criadero.
					
					La piscifactoria de Sinchang, situada en un lugar ideal para criar los peces desde el punto de vista geofisica y ambiente ecologico, constituye el criadero de gran dimension digno de enorgullecerse al mundo tanto en su area de produccion como en la cantidad productiva, recalco.
					
					Este criadero ha acumulado abundantes experiencias en la acuicultura y tiene una firme base tecnico-material, acoto y destaco la necesidad de cumplir su mision y papel como piscifactoria que muestra indice tecnico de acuicultura en desarrollo continuo y como unidad ejemplar y educador en desarrollar la acuicultura del pais tranzando las metas mas ambiciosas.
					
					El partido tiene la firme decision de avivar en todo el pais el fervor de la revolucion de acuicultura ofrecido por los generalisimos, subrayo y dio las instrucciones programaticas para registrar nuevos virajes en la acuicultura del pais.
					
					Convencido de que los funcionarios y empleados del criadero cumpliran su papel vanguardista en el desarrollo de acuicultura del pais tomo foto de recuerdo junto con ellos.
					
					Le acompanaron Hwang Pyong So, Kim Yang Gon, O Su Yong, O Il Jong, Ri Jae Il, Jo Yong Won, Pak Yong Sik y O Kum Chol.

articles.title: Kim Jong Un envia mensajes de respuesta a jefes de Estado de varios paises
articles.content:
Kim Jong Un envia mensajes de respuesta a jefes de Estado de varios paises 
						
Pyongyang, 15 de mayo (ACNC) -- El Mariscal Kim Jong Un envio los mensajes de respuesta a los jefes de Estado de varios paises que le enviaron cartas de felicitacion con motivo del dia de natalicio del Presidente Kim Il Sung. 
					Entre ellos figuran el presidente de la Republica de la Union de Myanmar, Thein Sein, el presidente de la Republica Arabe de Siria, Bashar al-Assad, el presidente de la Republica Islamica de Pakistan, Mamnoon Hussain, el presidente y comandante en jefe de las fuerzas armadas de la Republica Federal de Nigeria, Goodluck Ebele Jonathan, el presidente de la Republica Democratica del Congo, Joseph Kabila Kabange, y el presidente de la Republica de Uganda, Yoweri Kaguta Museveni.
					
					El Mariscal expreso en las misivas su profundo agradecimiento por haberle enviado las sinceras felicitaciones con motivo del Dia del Sol. 
					
					Convencido de que las excelentes relaciones de amistad y cooperacion existentes entre la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea y los paises correspondientes, el remitente deseo exitos en los trabajos de los destinatarios por la estabilidad y la prosperidad del pais.

articles.title: Kim Yong Nam recibe cartas credenciales de nuevo embajador espanol
articles.content:
Kim Yong Nam recibe cartas credenciales de nuevo embajador espanol 
						
Pyongyang, 15 de mayo (ACNC) -- Gonzalo Ortiz Diez-Tortosa presento el dia 15 en el capitalino Palacio de los Congresos Mansudae ante el presidente del Presidium de la Asamblea Popular Suprema de la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea, Kim Yong Nam, sus cartas credenciales que le acreditan como nuevo embajador extraordinario y plenipotenciario del Reino de Espana en la RPDC.
					Tras recibirlas, Kim departio con el diplomatico.

articles.title: Atrocidad fascista de reaccionarios japoneses no podra evitar severo castigo de coreanos
articles.content:
Atrocidad fascista de reaccionarios japoneses no podra evitar severo castigo de coreanos
						
Pyongyang, 15 de mayo (ACNC) -- El Comite Coreano por Medidas sobre el Problema de ex Esclavas Sexuales para el Ejercito Japones y Victimas de Reclutamiento Forzoso hizo publica el dia 15 una declaracion para condenar la atrocidad barbara de los reaccionarios japoneses contra los funcionarios de la Chongryon (Asociacion General de Coreanos Residentes en Japon).
					El arresto cometido en el dia 12 es una imperdonable violacion a la soberania de la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea y una insoportable represion fascista a la Chongryon, denuncia asi el documento y continua:
					
					Es la ilegal atrocidad fascista infundada y la continuacion de las maniobras anti-Chongryon organizadas y planificadas por las autoridades japonesas.
					
					Su maligna intencion persigue manchar la imagen de la Chongryon, legitima entidad de los ciudadanos ultramarinos de la RPDC e infundir en la sociedad japonesa el ambiente hostil a la Chongryon y los coreanos, acusando la Chongryon de "entidad ilegal y criminal".
					
					Todos los hechos demuestran que el "estado constitucional" de que suelen hablar los reaccionarios japoneses no pasa de ser una mascara para enganar el mundo y que Japon es el estado policiaco, antietico y fascista.
					
					Los reaccionarios japoneses deben actuar con prudencia al ver correctamente la firme voluntad de castigo de la RPDC, poner de inmediato fin a sus maniobras pueriles encaminadas a exterminar la Chongryon y pedir disculpa ante la nacion coreana y la Chongryon por sus crimenes antieticos y anti-DDHH.

articles.title: ACRFF demanda a Japon poner en libertad a funcionarios de Chongryon
articles.content:
ACRFF demanda a Japon poner en libertad a funcionarios de Chongryon 
						
Pyongyang, 15 de mayo (ACNC) -- El portavoz de la Asociacion de Coreanos Reclutados Forzosamente y sus Familiares (ACRFF) publico el dia 15 una declaracion denunciando la campana de represion anti-Chongryon (Asociacion General de Coreanos Residentes en Japon).
					En marzo pasado, los reaccionarios japoneses cometieron el registro forzoso sobre las casas de los cuadros directivos de la Chongryon. Y hace unos dias, volvieron a arrestar ilicitamente a los funcionarios de esta legitima organizacion. 
					
					Al tomar en consideracion las costumbres diplomaticas internacionales y los conocimientos elementales, es intolerable esta extremada provocacion hostil a la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea. 
					
					Lo mas indignante es que el pais isla, objeto de repudio internacional por dirigirse a la nueva agresion militarista sin reconocer ni reflexionar sobre sus crimenes estatales de arresto forzoso del tiempo pasado, pisotea a plena luz del dia la dignidad de la nacion coreana. 
					
					La ACRFF demanda fuertemente a las autoridades japonesas pedir perdon por haber cometido sin escrupulos la violencia fascista de lesa humanidad contra la Chongryon, prestigiosa organizacion de ciudadanos ultramarinos de la RPDC, y poner de inmediato en libertad a las victimas inocentes. 
					
					Los reaccionarios japoneses deben actuar con prudencia teniendo presente que la represion anti-Chongryon les llevara a la autodestruccion.

articles.title: AJDC condena represion bestial de reaccionarios japoneses contra Chongryon
articles.content:
AJDC condena represion bestial de reaccionarios japoneses contra Chongryon
Pyongyang, 15 de mayo (ACNC) -- Como trascendidos, el pasado dia 12, los policias del grupo de investigacion conjunta arrestaron a 3 funcionarios de la Chongryon inclusive el subdirector del Presidium del Comite Central de la Chongryon ante sus familiares bajo la sospecha infundada de la "violacion de la ley de divisas de la Compania Limitada del Oriente" y registraron a fuerza sus hogares.
					En su nota fechada 14, el portavoz de la Asociacion de Juristas Democraticos de Corea (AJDC) denuncia en nombre de toda la nacion el arresto brutal de los reaccionarios japoneses a los funcionarios de la Chongryon calificandolo de provocacion politica contra la RPDC y la Chongryon, el ilegitimo acto violador de DDHH y la represion fascista y prosiguio:
					
					La presente atrocidad de los reaccionarios japoneses persigue la malsana meta de exterminar la Chongryon al ponerle la gorra de "entidad ilegal y criminal" y realizar a toda costa la revitalizacion militarista y la ambicion de reagresion a Asia al inculcar en la sociedad japonesa el clima anti-Chongryon y anti-RPDC.
					
					Los actos fascistas de los reaccionarios japoneses agrandan sus crimenes cometidos en el pasado contra la nacion coreana, lo que centuplica el sentimiento antijapones de 70 millones coreanos.
					
					Las autoridades japonesas deben actuar con prudencia teniendo bien presente de las consecuencias catastroficas que se emanen de sus represiones anti-Chongryon, excarcelar de inmediato a los funcionarios detenidos injustamente y pedir disculpas ante la nacion coreana.
					
					Los conscientes juristas japoneses y la sociedad internacional deben ver correctamente el malsano intento de represion a la Chongryon de caracter anti-democratico y anti-DDHH de las autoridades japonesas y retenerlo rotundamente.

articles.title: XV Festival Arquitectonico 21 de Mayo
articles.content:
XV Festival Arquitectonico 21 de Mayo
						
Pyongyang, 15 de mayo (ACNC) -- Tuvo lugar en esta capital el XV Festival Arquitectonico 21 de Mayo atrayendo la atencion de los especialistas de la arquitectura y la construccion.
					Segun Ryu Jae Ung, funcionario del Comite Central de la Union de Arquitectos de Corea, en la ocasion estaban exhibidos mas de 230 disenos arquitectonicos, mas de 280 disertaciones cientificas, mas de 20 programas de construccion y multimedios y mas de 20 materias de construccion, seleccionados en la capital y las provincias.
					
					Ademas se veian el diseno de formacion de viviendas verdes, el de las escuelas primarias y secundarias de las provincias, el de gimnasio de la ciudad (o municipio) y el distrito, el de adornos interiores y muebles, el de carreteras y puentes principales, el de macetero y silla hechos con neumaticos usados y otros.
					
					Todos los disenos llevan la peculiaridad de la ciudad de Pyongyang y las respectivas localidades.
					
					Conforme a la tendencia mundial de desarrollo arquitectonico con rumbo a la arquitectura verde, en cada diseno estan reflejadas las tecnologias de la energia cero y el carbono cero que mejoran el medioambiente ecologico, entre otras, los edificios verdes que usan la energia solar, eolica y geotermica al crear el area verde en los parques, techos y paredes.
					
					En la rama de programas y multimedios se exhibio el metodo de disenar en pentadimension a ser contribuido a la modernizacion del diseno arquitectonico.
					
					En la exhibicion de materiales de construccion se presentaron los materiales funcionales y otros hechos con desechos industriales y abundantes materias primas con anexo de buena calidad.
					
					El festival sirvio de un motivo para desarrollar mas las ciencias y las tecnologias arquitectonicas del pais.

articles.title: Brigada de Choque Juvenil Batalla de Velocidad acoge 40o aniversario de fundacion
articles.content:
Brigada de Choque Juvenil Batalla de Velocidad acoge 40o aniversario de fundacion 
						
Pyongyang, 15 de mayo (ACNC) -- La Brigada de Choque Juvenil Batalla de Velocidad acogio el 40o aniversario de su fundacion. 
					El Dirigente Kim Jong Il la organizo hace ahora 40 anos y la formo como un poderoso destacamento que abre la brecha en la construccion. 
					
					La Brigada realizo sus primeros meritos en la obra de electrificacion del ferrocarril Huichon-Koin y la construccion del nuevo ferrocarril Kujang-Phalwon, obsequios dedicados al 30o aniversario de la fundacion del Partido del Trabajo de Corea. Y desde entonces hasta la fecha ha recorrido la trayectoria orgullosa poniendo de pleno manifiesto el poderio del destacamento regular y combativo en los campos de construccion. 
					
					Los miembros de mando y otros integrantes de la Brigada registraron meritos heroicos en los campos de construccion de monumentos para glorificar las tradiciones revolucionarias del PTC y en la obra del ferrocarril septentrional y dedicaron la juventud en las construcciones de la Exposicion Permanente de Amistad Internacional, el Palacio de Estudio del Pueblo, las avenidas Kwangbok y Thong-il, la Carretera Heroina Juventud, la avenida Mansudae, etc.
					
					La Brigada recibio la Orden Kim Il Sung y la Orden Bandera Nacional de primera clase y se ha formado como un instituto revolucionario que forma a los jovenes medulares del partido.
					
					Muchos miembros de la Brigada recibieron el Premio de Honor Juvenil Kim Il Sung y otras condecoraciones estatales y se hicieron innovadores juveniles e inventores. 
					
					El acto por el 40o aniversario de la fundacion de la Brigada tuvo lugar este viernes en el capitalino Palacio Cultural del Pueblo.
					
					En el acto fue transmitido el mensaje de felicitacion del Comite Central del PTC enviado a los miembros de mando y los integrantes de la Brigada.
